channel.title: Standard Form for "Awesome Idea"
channel.description:
This is the Standard Form for "Awesome Idea". I have you have an awesome idea please use this form to express it: [i] [COLOR='YellowGreen']In [[COLOR='PaleGreen']1] it was mentioned that [[COLOR='PaleGreen']2] was [[COLOR='PaleGreen']3] (with) [[COLOR='PaleGreen']4] at Black Mesa. Therefore I think it would be an awesome idea to include [[COLOR='PaleGreen']4] into the Black Mesa mod.[/i]
[[COLOR='PaleGreen']1]: Insert your type of media our trusted source which is supposed to justify your claims (eg. Gabe Newell interviews, Half-Life references in TF2, Raising the Bar). [[COLOR='PaleGreen']2]: Insert the First Name of a HL character (eg. Barney), in case of a nerdy or evil character mention his last name and academic rank instead (eg. Dr. Breen, Dr. Kleiner). [[COLOR='PaleGreen']3]: Insert your action of choice. Be sure to include adverbs. [[COLOR='PaleGreen']4]: Insert your object or person of choice. (Eg. Hats, Dragons, Charlie Sheen).
Examples of correct use of the form: [quote] [COLOR='YellowGreen']In [[COLOR='PaleGreen']Portal 2] it was mentioned that [[COLOR='PaleGreen']Dr. Breen] was [[COLOR='PaleGreen']busy dealing] (with) [[COLOR='PaleGreen']Hats] at Black Mesa. Therefore I think it would be an awesome idea to include [[COLOR='PaleGreen']Hats] into the Black Mesa mod. [/quote]
[quote] [COLOR='YellowGreen']In [[COLOR='PaleGreen']Wikipedia] it was mentioned that [[COLOR='PaleGreen']Barney] was [[COLOR='PaleGreen']watching] (with) [[COLOR='PaleGreen']Seinfeld] at Black Mesa. Therefore I think it would be an awesome idea to include [[COLOR='PaleGreen']Seinfeld] into the Black Mesa mod. [/quote] Have fun using this standard form.

item.title: Standard Form for "Awesome Idea"
item.dc:creator: ManlyStump
item.description:
‘Standard form for "Awes…’

You folks never hear of the trade’s descriptions act?!

Read full topic

item.title: Standard Form for "Awesome Idea"
item.dc:creator: tonkat
item.description:
AliDuh1:

In my minecraft server, it was mentioned that I was going to jiggle you into the next generation at Black Mesa.
Therefore, I think it would be an awesome idea to include immense amounts of Jiggly puffs and time machines into the Black Mesa mod.

…sure…?

Read full topic

item.title: Standard Form for "Awesome Idea"
item.dc:creator: nanoviral
item.description:
Ryλn:

In my moist rectal cavity, it was mentioned that black dwarf amputees were tossing salads with little girls at Black Mesa.
Therefore, I think it would be an awesome idea to include immense amounts of concentrated hallucinogens and cocaine into the Black Mesa mod.

This is what this game needs more than anything:rabies:

Read full topic

item.title: Standard Form for "Awesome Idea"
item.dc:creator: Disturbulator
item.description:
Roverin:

the physics in portal 2 and half-life 2 episode 2 were epic so it would be great to see those in BM. and better story-telling mechanics like in the half-life 2 series and portal 2 game would be epic

There’s a difference between scripted animations and physics.

Read full topic

item.title: Standard Form for "Awesome Idea"
item.dc:creator: Power_Dust
item.description:
Since the engine Half-Life 2: Episode Two and Portal 2 are using is the same and only differs in the version I highly doubt that the physics are better than in previous games. I suppose you are referring to the cinematic physics which aren’t actual physics but rather pre-rendered sequences.

Read full topic

item.title: Standard Form for "Awesome Idea"

item.description:
I think it was stated somewhere that there will be corpses of administrators, technicians etc. but no NPCs. Well, at least something.

Read full topic

item.title: Standard Form for "Awesome Idea"
item.dc:creator: Dr_Karamazov
item.description:
this is utterly pointless considering how far along the mod is, but…

what always bothered (I use bothered in it’s weakest form) me was that the entire BM complex was inhabited and staffed entirely by scientists and security guards.
What about administration staff? Engineers? Mechanics? Cafeteria workers? Cleaners?
Medical staff (doctors, nurses, therapists)

The lighting in the facility alone would require a team of 20 electricians.

Of course, I am well aware that to create models for each of these types would be time consuming.
It would have been nice if BMS would have included a little variety in this respect, although it’s good to see that the zombies can also be security zombies and not just scientists.

Read full topic
